metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35501 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: kernel: audit not logging access to syscall open_by_handle_at for users with CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH capability

notes.Note: sbeattie> the commits listed in the github issue are false hits due to the string '#9' showing up in kernel oops backtraces. unfixed as of 2021.07.20

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021.07.20').
